newsitem.title: JAPAN: Takeda to sell SmithKline digestive drug in Japan.
newsitem.headline: Takeda to sell SmithKline digestive drug in Japan.

text.p: Takeda Chemical Industries Ltd said on Monday that it would market an over-the-counter digestive drug developed by SmithKline Beecham Plc from September in Japan.
The drug, Cimetidine, has been available only at hospitals until now.

The Japanese government is promoting the use of over-the-counter drugs in the hopes of reducing National Health Insurance spending, under which drugs prescribed at hospitals are wholly or partly reimbursed by the government.
